alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Watch issued December 23 at 7:57AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE FOREST SERVICE UTAH AVALANCHE CENTER. * WHAT...AVALANCHE WATCH. THE AVALANCHE DANGER IS EXPECTED TO RISE RAPIDLY. * WHERE...NORTHERN WASATCH MOUNTAINS IN FRANKLIN AND BEAR LAKE COUNTIES. * WHEN...6 AM THURSDAY, DECEMBER 23RD UNTIL 6 AM FRIDAY, DECEMBER 24TH. * IMPACTS...HEAVY DENSE SNOWFALL AND STRONG WINDS WILL LIKELY CREATE VERY DANGEROUS AVALANCHE CONDITIONS BOTH HUMAN TRIGGERED AND NATURAL AVALANCHES LIKELY STAY OFF AND OUT FROM UNDER SLOPES STEEPER THAN 30 DEGREES. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... BACKCOUNTRY TRAVELERS SHOULD CONSULT WWW.UTAHAVALANCHECENTER.ORG OR CALL 1-888-999-4019 FOR MORE DETAILED INFORMATION. THIS WATCH DOES NOT APPLY TO SKY AREAS WHERE AVALANCHE HAZARD REDUCTION MEASURES ARE PERFORMED.
